tool.name: EPrimer3
tool.description: Picks PCR primers and hybridization oligos

param.name: input1
param.label: Sequence

param.name: primer
param.label: Tell EPrimer3 to pick primer(s)

param.name: task
param.label: Tell EPrimer3 what task to perform

param.name: hybridprobe
param.label: An 'internal oligo' is intended to be used as a hybridization probe (hyb probe) to detect the PCR product after amplification

param.name: numreturn
param.label: The maximum number of primer pairs to return

param.name: gcclamp
param.label: Require the specified number of consecutive Gs and Cs at the 3' end of both the forward and reverse primer.

param.name: osize
param.label: Optimum length (in bases) of a primer oligo

param.name: minsize
param.label: Minimum acceptable length of a primer

param.name: maxsize
param.label: Maximum acceptable length (in bases) of a primer

param.name: otm
param.label: Optimum melting temperature(Celsius) for a primer oligo

param.name: mintm
param.label: Minimum acceptable melting temperature(Celsius) for a primer oligo

param.name: maxtm
param.label: Maximum acceptable melting temperature(Celsius) for a primer oligo

param.name: maxdifftm
param.label: Maximum acceptable (unsigned) difference between the melting temperatures of the forward and reverse primers

param.name: ogcpercent
param.label: Primer optimum GC percent

param.name: mingc
param.label: Minimum allowable percentage of Gs and Cs in any primer

param.name: maxgc
param.label: Maximum allowable percentage of Gs and Cs in any primer generated by Primer

param.name: saltconc
param.label: The millimolar concentration of salt (usually KCl) in the PCR. EPrimer3 uses this argument to calculate oligo melting temperatures

param.name: dnaconc
param.label: The nanomolar concentration of annealing oligos in the PCR.

param.name: maxpolyx
param.label: The maximum allowable length of a mononucleotide repeat in a primer, for example AAAAAA

param.name: productosize
param.label: The optimum size for the PCR product. 0 indicates that there is no optimum product size

param.name: productsizerange
param.label: The associated values specify the lengths of the product that the user wants the primers to create, and is a space separated list of elements of the form (x)-(y) where an (x)-(y) pair is a legal range of lengths for the product

param.name: productotm
param.label: The optimum melting temperature for the PCR product. 0 indicates that there is no optimum temperature

param.name: productmintm
param.label: The minimum allowed melting temperature of the amplicon

param.name: productmaxtm
param.label: The maximum allowed melting temperature of the amplicon

param.name: oligoosize
param.label: Optimum length (in bases) of an internal oligo

param.name: oligominsize
param.label: Minimum acceptable length of an internal oligo

param.name: oligomaxsize
param.label: Maximum acceptable length (in bases) of an internal oligo

param.name: oligootm
param.label: Optimum melting temperature (Celsius) for an internal oligo

param.name: oligomintm
param.label: Minimum acceptable melting temperature(Celsius) for an internal oligo

param.name: oligomaxtm
param.label: Maximum acceptable melting temperature (Celsius) for an internal oligo

param.name: oligoogcpercent
param.label: Internal oligo optimum GC percent

param.name: oligomingc
param.label: Minimum allowable percentage of Gs and Cs in an internal oligo

param.name: oligomaxgc
param.label: Maximum allowable percentage of Gs and Cs in any internal oligo generated by Primer

param.name: oligosaltconc
param.label: The millimolar concentration of salt (usually KCl) in the hybridization

param.name: oligodnaconc
param.label: The nanomolar concentration of annealing internal oligo in the hybridization

param.name: oligoselfany
param.label: The maximum allowable local alignment score when testing an internal oligo for (local) self-complementarity

param.name: oligoselfend
param.label: The maximum allowable 3'-anchored global alignment score when testing a single oligo for self-complementarity

param.name: oligomaxpolyx
param.label: The maximum allowable length of an internal oligo mononucleotide repeat, for example AAAAAA.

param.name: explainflag
param.label: Provide information on the number of oligos and primer pairs that EPrimer3 examined, and statistics on the number discarded for various reasons

param.name: firstbaseindex
param.label: This parameter is the index of the first base in the input sequence

param.name: pickanyway
param.label: If true pick a primer pair even if LEFT-INPUT, RIGHT-INPUT, or INTERNAL-OLIGO-INPUT violates specific constraints

param.name: numnsaccepted
param.label: Maximum number of unknown bases (N) allowable in any primer

param.name: selfany
param.label: The maximum allowable local alignment score when testing a single primer for (local) self-complementarity and the maximum allowable local alignment score when testing for complementarity between forward and reverse primers

param.name: selfend
param.label: The maximum allowable 3'-anchored global alignment score when testing a single primer for self-complementarity, and the maximum allowable 3'-anchored global alignment score when testing for complementarity between forward and reverse primers

param.name: maxendstability
param.label: The maximum stability for the five 3' bases of a forward or reverse primer. Bigger numbers mean more stable 3' ends
